description: Enterprise techniques used by PUNCHTRACK, ATT&CK software S0197 v1.1
name: PUNCHTRACK (S0197)

techniques.comment: [PUNCHTRACK](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0197) scrapes memory for properly formatted payment card data.(Citation: FireEye Fin8 May 2016)(Citation: FireEye Know Your Enemy FIN8 Aug 2016)
[PUNCHTRACK](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0197) aggregates collected data in a tmp file.(Citation: FireEye Know Your Enemy FIN8 Aug 2016)
[PUNCHTRACK](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0197) is loaded and executed by a highly obfuscated launcher.(Citation: FireEye Fin8 May 2016)
